commenter_a: Trump's ability to showboat and boast out loud has a hypnotic impact on people who should know better. Please don't buy into Trumpmania.... he is all talk and I thought we were tired of that. You people have short memories. He was a full on liberal democrat just a few short years ago. Trump is telling you what you want to hear. He has no intentions of fulfilling these vocal obligations. It's all lip service and he will cater to his businesses before the people. Just because Bush isn't a loud mouth narcissist doesn't mean he can't get the job done. Trust me, you will never be so sick of anything as you will be of The Donald and his ego driven power play.
